author: Ira Iosebashvili
title: Dollar Headed for Another Quarterly Decline
text:
The dollar headed for its fifth straight quarterly decline Friday, after a three-month stretch that saw gains in the yen and euro.
The WSJ Dollar Index, which measures the U.S. currency against a basket of 16 others, was recently down 0.1% at 83.73. The measure is on track for a 2.6% drop in the first quarter.
Expectations of accelerating...
